oh, but the ones which you can paint will allow you to customize the
uniform...e.g. Mibugishiden uniform color scheme (black+red)...ack, I
used to post really good ebay links at rkdreams.com with these figures
you can assembled+paint (ofcourse if have unsteady hands you may want
to settle for the plastic figures)...they are unofficial but very good
quality and beautiful...some are ~almost~ a foot high
